posts.message:
HURRY UP! Registration deadline is extended for two more days till midnight May 2nd, 2013

We have also received many questions about the Full Agenda of the two days. Okay, everything will be available on the page here and will be emailed to you with your ticket details on Midnight Friday May 3rd, 2013. And with the quality of the speakers and carefully put contents for the two days, we promise this will hit your expectation bar high enough inchaAllah.

The two days will go with around 13 sessions and 6~8 workshops, with ability for you to attend all the sessions and two of the workshops. And guess what, this is for FREE!

So what are you waiting for, hurry up and REGISTER NOW!

Professionals’ registration form:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1C1U0vB5kU14LDrJAZ9WYXDvTiOD0IrafgrTgwJSSwkk/viewform

Students’ registration form:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/18eiOASd-nmm8TS_WsFid4RfGZ8v8yEdjCM-Cg_V-0fw/viewform
posts.description:
=====================================
Registration is now OPEN! and what's more, it's for FREE!
=====================================

The Inevitable Cloud Community is collaborating with the Information Technology Institute ITI and are organizing the biggest Cloud Computing event in Egypt, CLOUD WEEKEND ’13 May 11-12, 2013. The event will bring together a broad array of top-level IT professionals from business, academia and government communities who will tackle these topics and detail their experience with us.

CLOUD WEEKEND ‘13 is a networking event that provides a unique setting for attendees to meet and network with peers, partners, prospective vendors and colleagues from global multi-national organizations. 

Thanks for the Information Technology Institute ITI, Attending the conference this year is for free! Yes, once your registration application is approved, you’ll have your ticket to attend the full two-day event for free!

We promise that CLOUD WEEKEND ‘13 will be the best event yet and we would love you to be a part of it! So hurry up and register now

Professionals’ registration form:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1C1U0vB5kU14LDrJAZ9WYXDvTiOD0IrafgrTgwJSSwkk/viewform

Students’ registration form: 
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/18eiOASd-nmm8TS_WsFid4RfGZ8v8yEdjCM-Cg_V-0fw/viewform

Deadline for registration is April 28, 2013. So hurry up and register now!

Approved attendees should receive their free tickets by email on May 3rd, 2013

posts.message:
Guys, any idea how to push notification (PhoneGap) with Parse 
i Post on this URL https://api.parse.com/1/push and JSON object { "channels": ["Broadcast"],
"data": { "title":"test", "alert": "test" } }

It works if the app is running on the background, need to fix this to work if the app is closed? any ideas?

posts.message:
راديو اسأل مطور, الحلقة العاشرة, في هذه الحلقة نستعرض موضوع جديد و هو موضوع أنظمة التخزين الحديثة, و التي تتعدى مجرد قواعد البيانات الكلاسيكية, نتعرض بتفصيل لأسباب اللجوء لهذا النوع من تقنيات التخزين, و فوائده و عيوبه, و أشهر التقنيات التجارية في هذه الأيام
Ask Developer Podcast, Episode 10, in this episode we discuss the NOSQL subject, which challenges the traditional database models in the current web scale world, we discuss in details the motivations behind this kind of technology, and the pros & cons of it.
